aka: Mayhem! The Scandalous Lives of the Georgian Kings
this_title: Mayhem! The Secret Lives of the Georgian Kings Season 1
trans_title: Mayhem! The Scandalous Lives of the Georgian Kings
introduction: The Georgian Kings belong to one of the most dysfunctional royal dynasties in British history. Loved and loathed by the public in equal measure, their scandals, back-stabbings, feuds and betrayals shaped an entire era of British history. This is a true-life Succession for the 18th Century. Combining dramatic reconstruction with expert testimony from leading historians, MAYHEM! THE SCANDALOUS LIVES OF THE GEORGIAN KINGS will turn everything you thought you knew about the Georgian era on its head.Producer: One Tribe TV
chinese_title: Mayhem! The Secret Lives of the Georgian Kings Season 1
